Content.Measurement Context: HAADF-STEM imaging was performed on a JEOL Grand ARM300CF microscope with double aberration correctors at 300 kV.
Images were collected after ex-situ calcination of samples at 450° C.
A beam current of 11 pA was used with pixel time of 4 μs.
A beam current of 11 pA was used with pixel time of 4 μs.
XAS at the Re L3 edge (10535 eV) was executed on beamlines 4-1 and 9-3 at the Stanford Synchrotron Radiation Lightsource at the SLAC National Laboratory using a Si(220) double crystal monochromator.
Content.Refers To: energy at the Re L3 edge for XAS

Content.Measurement Context: In a typical experiment, 30 mg of catalyst was crushed, sieved (80-120 mesh), and loaded into a 1 cm catalyst bed
Content.Refers To: amount of catalyst used in experiment
